member.name: EMRGDICOMMENT
member.summary: The EMRGDICOMMENT structure contains application-specific data. This enhanced metafile record is only meaningful to applications that know the format of the data and how to utilize it. This record is ignored by graphics device interface (GDI) during playback of the enhanced metafile.

member.name: EMRGDICOMMENT.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRGDICOMMENT.cbData
member.summary: Size of data buffer, in bytes.
